Add link to blog posts on home page

Update file app/views/welcome/index.html.erb

Remove 

 <h1>Hello, Rails!</h1>

Add 

 <h1>Hello, Rails!</h1>
 <%= link_to "My Blog", controller: "posts" %>

Becomes 

\ No newline at end of file
 <h1>Hello, Rails!</h1>
 <%= link_to "My Blog", controller: "posts" %>
\ No newline at end of file
